name: Mr. Tiny Adventures
summary: Mr Tiny is a single worker to whom the spell of a witch has caused him to become the size of an insect. Drag your 30 grams of weight through various scenarios, where any single and common object can be a deadly enemy. You need to finish 9 levels of the game to get all the talismans to help you break the spell of the witch and restore your normal size. Mr Tiny, the great lover of beer, is depending on you. Drive through large areas of the kitchen, the pipes, the garden, the street... till the witch house ( your neighbor) Avoid the enemies that come your way, You can kill them as well as jump over them like in other games. Move objects to access to different higher places, which before he had to crouch down to get to. See how you can change the life of a single person in an extreme situation.
